metadata.title: CVE-2019-12881 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
i915_gem_userptr_get_pages in drivers/gpu/drm/i915/i915_gem_userptr.c inthe Linux kernel 4.15.0 on Ubuntu 18.04.2 allows local users to cause adenial of service (NULL pointer dereference and BUG) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via crafted ioctl calls to /dev/dri/card0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12881` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-lowlatency - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-snapdragon - 5.4.0-9.12
No subscription required
